Napa.Rocktram, California: Rocktram (also, Rockfram) is an unincorporated community in Napa County, California. It lies at an elevation of 13 feet (4 m). Rocktram is located on the Southern Pacific Railroad, 3 miles (4.8 km) south of Napa, at the junction with the Napa Valley Railroad and the Basalt Rock Company rock tram.
